https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:QJ46-GJ6B : accessed 10 August 20152 News/Obit* 17 November 2011 Marlene E. Younkin Schnatterly, 70, of Somerset

Marlene E. Younkin Schnatterly, 70, of Somerset, died Nov. 16, 2011 at In Touch Hospice House of Journey's Rest, Somerset. She was born May 15, 1941 in Lower Turkeyfoot Township, a daughter of Robert, Jr. and Alice (Rugg) Harbaugh.

Her parents, husband, Arden Schnatterly, grandson Brandon Younkin, brothers, Charles Clinton and Clifford, and sister, Ethel Pearl Kemp preceded her in death.

She is survived by a son, Robert B. Younkin, Somerset; daughters: Susan J. Moon and husband, Ross G. III, Somerset, and Julie A. Custer and companion, Jay Anderson, Confluence; grandchildren, Robert Younkin, Jr. and wife, Robin, John Allan Younkin and wife, Trista, Andrea Younkin and companion, Jason Walker, Ross G. Moon IV and wife, Cassie, Gina Rake and husband, Tim, Frederick Balsley and companion, Christine and Mia Custer; seven great-grandchildren; brothers: Oscar Harbaugh and wife, Opal, Somerset, James Harbaugh and wife, Beverly, Rockwood, Donald Harbaugh and wife, Ronnie, Sykesville, Md., and a sister, Esther Melia , Rockwood.

Marlene was an employee of Wal-Mart in Somerset for 17 years and a former member of the Somerset American Legion.

Friends will be received from 2 to 4 and 7 to 9 p.m. Friday at the Humbert Funeral Home in Confluence, where a service will be held at 11 a.m. Saturday with Rev. James Monticue officiating. Interment in Somerset County Memorial Park.

Published in The Daily American, (Somerset, PA) - November 17, 20113
